title: Documentation
content:
Technology Documentation Hub#Welcome to our comprehensive technology documentation portal. This site contains curated information about various aspects of modern technology infrastructure, development practices, and operational procedures.
Navigation#Use the sidebar to browse documentation by category, or use the search function to find specific topics.
Categories#Our documentation is organized into the following main categories:
AI & Machine Learning: Information about AI agents, tools, and frameworks Development Platforms: Documentation platforms, GitOps, and development workflows Infrastructure: Kubernetes, Helm, production readiness guides Workflows: Orchestration tools and automation patterns Browse the sections to find detailed information on each topic.

title: Mermaid Diagram Test
content:
Mermaid Diagram Test#This document tests various Mermaid diagram types to ensure they render correctly.
Flowchart#graph TDA[Start] --> B{Decision}B -->|Yes| C[Action 1]B -->|No| D[Action 2]C --> E[End]D --> ESequence Diagram#sequenceDiagramparticipant Userparticipant Hugoparticipant ThemeUser->>Hugo: Build SiteHugo->>Theme: Apply Books ThemeTheme->>Hugo: Rendered HTMLHugo->>User: Static SiteClass Diagram#classDiagramclass Document {+String title+String summary+String[] keywords+String category+render()}class Site {+Document[] documents+build()+serve()}Site --> Document : containsIf all three diagrams above render as interactive SVG graphics instead of code blocks, then Mermaid is working correctly!

title: Test Document
content:
Test Document#This is a test document to verify that Hugo and the Books theme are working correctly.
Features to Test#Table of Contents#This document should show a table of contents on the right side with the following sections:
Features to Test Table of Contents Mermaid Diagrams Code Blocks Lists and Formatting Mermaid Diagrams#Here’s a test Mermaid diagram:
graph TDA[Hugo Site] --> B[Books Theme]B --> C[Test Document]C --> D[Rendered Page]D --> E[Success!]Code Blocks#Here’s a code block to test syntax highlighting:
function testHugo() { console.log("Hugo and Books theme are working!"); return true; }Lists and Formatting#Bold text and italic text should render correctly.
Numbered list item 1 Numbered list item 2 Numbered list item 3 Bullet point 1 Bullet point 2 Bullet point 3 This is a blockquote to test formatting.
If you can see this document rendered properly with:
Table of contents on the right Proper navigation in the sidebar Formatted text and code blocks The Mermaid diagram (if configured) Then Hugo and the Books theme are working correctly!
